(colorComplete = 'rgba(30, 250, 22, 0.2)') : (colorComplete = '') } const renderTasks = () => { return props.tsks.tsks.map((tsk) => { return (
{' '}
{tsk.title} {tsk.startTime}-{tsk.endTime} {tsk.notes} ) }) } return ( <> {console.log(props.tsks.tsks)}

) } const mapStateToProps = (state) => { return { tsks: state.tsks } } export default connect(mapStateToProps)(Tasks)
